title: Subtitle K - New York State Police
content:
Subtitle K - New York State Police

State Regulations

Part 468 - St. Regis Mohawk Tribal Police (§ 468.1 to 468.6)

Part 469 - Temporary Reappointment Of Retired Members (§ 469.1 to 469.5)

Part 470 - Firearms License For Retired Members (§ 470.1 to 470.9)

Part 471 - Minimum Standards For Gun Locking Devices (§ 471.1 to 471.4)

Part 472 - Combined Ballistic Identification System (cobis) Rules (§ 472.1 to 472.8)

Part 473 - Criminal Gun Clearinghouse Rules and Municipal Gun Buyback Rules (Subpart 473-1 to 473-2)

Part 474 - Sale Of Self-defense Spray Devices (§ 474.1 to 474.5)

Part 475 - Appointment To Position Of Trooper (§ 475.1 to 475.3)

Part 476 - Appointment To Certain Noncompetitive Positions (§ 476.1 to 476.2)

Part 477 - Appointment To Civilian Positions (§ 477.1 to 477.6)

Part 478 - Submission And Settlement Of Grievances Of Members (§ 478.1 to 478.8)

Part 479 - Disciplinary Action (§ 479.1 to 479.14)

Part 480 - Payments To An Owner Or Tenant Or Residential Property Or Commercial Property Upon Their Application For Allowance Of Moving Expenses In Vacating Property Acquired By The Superintendent Of State Police (§ 480.1 to 480.5)

Part 481 - Reappointment To Member Positions After Resignation (§ 481.1)

Part 482 - Licensed Gunsmiths Engaged In The Business Of Assembling Or Manufacturing Firearms (§ 482.1 to 482.7)

Part 483 - Public Access To Records Of New York State Police (§ 483.1 to 483.9)

Part 484 - Investigations Of Complaints Against Personnel (§ 484.1 to 484.2)

Part 485 - Access To Personal Information (§ 485.1 to 485.13)

Part 486 - New York Statewide Police Information Network (nyspin) Rules (§ 486.1 to 486.4)

Part 487 - Consumer Product Protection Rules (§ 487.1 to 487.5)

Part 488 - Leave For Ordinary Disability (§ 488.1)

Part 489 - Order To Report For Duty (§ 489.1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
